H0.text: What arrow-toting Roman god is now most commonly seen around Valentine's Day. Apollo

H1.text: What arrow-toting Roman god is now most commonly seen around Valentine's Day. Diana

H2.text: What arrow-toting Roman god is now most commonly seen around Valentine's Day. Venus

H3.text: What arrow-toting Roman god is now most commonly seen around Valentine's Day. Cupid

A4.text: Cupid is shown drawing his bow to inspire romantic love, often as an icon of Valentine's Day.

A5.text: Cupid carries two kinds of arrows, or darts, one with a sharp golden point, and the other with a blunt tip of lead.
